// src/services/api.js
import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://127.0.0.1:8000/',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('access');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
